name: Dinari DAL
description: The Dinari DAL dShares token (DAL.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in Delta Air Lines, Inc. (DAL), one of the largest global airline carriers. Delta operates an extensive domestic and international flight network, providing passenger and cargo transportation services worldwide. Each DAL.d token is fully backed by a corresponding Delta stock share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, DAL.d allows investors to gain exposure to the aviation and transportation industry, while benefiting from 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
